Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 12 Sekkhattika » 12.1 Paṭiccavāra » 12.1.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 12.1.2.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Naārammaṇa
Sekkhattika
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Vibhaṅgavāra
Naārammaṇa
8.
1674Sekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—  sekkhe khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. (1)
1675Asekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—  asekkhe khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. (1)
1676Nevasekkhanāsekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—  nevasekkhanāsekkhe khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ…pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe…  khandhe paṭicca vatthu…pe…  ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ…pe…  asaññasattānaṃ…pe… . (1)
1677Sekkhañca nevasekkhanāsekkhañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—  sekkhe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. (1)
1678Asekkhañca nevasekkhanāsekkhañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—  asekkhe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. (1)
